course_title: Health Policy & Law for the Clinical Perfusionist
course_description: This course examines the interplay of legal, ethical and policy issues in the delivery of healthcare and business practices of the perfusionist. The role of the perfusionist in designing, influencing, and implementing health policies will be emphasized.
sections: Class Nbr: 5258, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
